venue.name: Hess Gas - Intersection Mass Pike, Rt 128, and Commonwealth Ave

item.description:
Leave the Hess Station about 8:00 AM (KSU) We will head North on I-95, pick up Rt. 38 to 62. From this point we will hit some local roads to Rt. 125 and on to Rt.107 into Laconia. We will circle the lake sort of in a counter clockwise direction, and then carve our way back picking up Rt. 106 to Rt.3/28 and finally on to I 93 and home.

If riders want to meet in a location off I 95 please let me know so we can set a time and place, if not then the Hess Station, in Auburndale will be the only meet up location.
The weather is forecast to be bright and dry with temps in the 70's, however you should bring layers, since we start early and tend to go late.

This would be a 300 plus miles and about 10 hours or so, but that is always flexible.
item.how_to_find_us: The guys with smiles on their faces, riding scooters.
item.name: Lake Winnipesaukee and Laconia, NH
